query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Detailed Specification of the Infrastructure Platform v2
result.description: This report will detail the new solutions to be implemented related to the hybrid orchestration, the data and VMs/jobs management, the profiling component, the SLA management, the monitoring infrastructure and the accounting component. It will focus on the new features and modification of the existing ones in the first release, with the necessary UML diagrams.

result.title: Report on Dissemination, Collaboration and Involvement v1
result.description: This series of deliverables will explain the communication and dissemination activities followed during the reporting periods as well as the results from these activities and will update project’s dissemination and communication plans respectively. The report will include a section covering dissemination strategy under a more commercial or marketing oriented perspective. Yearly reports will also contain a section with updates about all events organized and conducted.

result.title: New tools for handling linked EO data and their evaluation – v2
result.description: Update on the tools to be developed. They include publishing tools that take as input EO data coming from the Copernicus services and transform it into RDF, tools for interlinking EO data and related geospatial data, tools for querying EO data published as RDF graphs, and tools for visualizing linked EO data. All tools will be available as open source.
